Proximity_Encryption_Suite

Class Device_Management

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window

              • Proximity_Encryption_Suite.Device_Management
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Device_Management
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    The Device_Management.Java Class implements an application that allows a user to alter a devices details such as the pin that is connected to the device.
    Since:
    18-01-2014
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harry Clewlow (C012952A)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
